haiku.description: Checks if text is ~5-7-5 haiku (with partial-credit).

limerick.description: Checks if text is a limerick with partial credit for line count, rhyme, etc.

rhyme.description: Checks if lines 1 and 2 rhyme (partial overlap or fallback).

arguments.name: --partial_threshold
arguments.help: Minimum fraction of overlapping phonemes required at the tail.

arguments.name: --fallback_credit
arguments.help: Score assigned if last letters match but phoneme overlap fails.

tanka.description: Checks if text is a 5-line tanka with ~5-7-5-7-7 syllables

arguments.name: --tolerance
arguments.help: Allowed Â± deviation from each line's syllable target
